title: 119: Questions Are For the Weak (Caleb Thompson & Matt Mongeau)
description: Sean and Derek are joined by Caleb Thompson and Matthew Mongeau for our annual live episode to discuss lessons learned from past projects, and speaking at conferences.
content:encoded:
Sean and Derek are joined by Caleb Thompson and Matthew Mongeau for our annual live episode to discuss lessons learned from past projects, and speaking at conferences.

  • Video Version
  • myglu.com (The project being discussed)
  • Sandi Metz' Rules for Developers
  • Facade pattern
  • Diesel's association API
  • has_many
  • The foreigner gem
  • Goose talks about designing a programming language
  • Service Objects
  • Monban
  • Why you shouldn't roll your own authentication
  • Please send Caleb sunglasses.
  • Rails 5.1 did ship while we were recording.
  • How to Talk to Developers
author: hosts@bikeshed.fm (thoughtbot)
itunes:author: thoughtbot
itunes:summary: Sean and Derek are joined by Caleb Thompson and Matthew Mongeau for our annual live episode to discuss lessons learned from past projects, and speaking at conferences.
